title: Best healing health resort I have experienced - Review of Kamalaya Koh Samui, Laem Set, Thailand - Tripadvisor
description: Kamalaya Koh Samui: Best healing health resort I have experienced - See 507 traveler reviews, 773 candid photos, and great deals for Kamalaya Koh Samui at Tripadvisor.
cleaned_text: The tiny Koh Samui airport has got to be one of the most charming to be found anywhere in the world. Traditional architecture. 10-passenger buggies to ferry the passenger to and from the airplane. An unhurried pace. Providing a perfect beginning to your visit to that popular island destination. Kamalaya is an adults-only wellbeing resort, an hour from the airport, on the southern side of the island. It sits along a steep hill looking on to the South China Sea. As with most resort visits, once you enter Kamalaya you really do not feel like stepping out. It is a world unto itself! With luxurious villas to relax in, one of the most beautifully intimate swimming pools to laze in, and everything devoted to improving your state of health. From exotic dishes made from diverse Thai fruit and vegetables, to naturopathic health remedies such as yoga, ayurveda, reiki, thai massages and homeopathy. I met two elderly ladies from Australia who claimed that the cost of travelling to Koh Samui, spending a week at Kamalaya, and taking in an average of three fairly expensive treatments a day was going to cost them less than what the same would cost at an equivalent resort in Australia! In contrast, I get a massage at my residence in Mumbai for only Rs 400/hour ($6)! A warning: Our suite's bathing area was located on an external balcony!
